com.ashraf.course.machinelearning.id3decisiontree.utilities

Class StatsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashraf.course.machinelearning.id3decisiontree.utilities.StatsUtil

  • public class StatsUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    StatsUtil class contains all the statistical utility methods (i.e. information gain, entropy, gini index) we need to calculate

      • calculateChiSquare

        public static java.lang.Double calculateChiSquare(java.util.List<Entry> entryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> aEntryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> cEntryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> gEntryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> tEntryList)
        This function is used to calculate chai square value from a parent data entry set and four subset of data entry
        Parameters:
        entryList - parent data entry list
        aEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base A
        cEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base C
        gEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base G
        tEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base T
        Returns:
        calculated chai square value
        Since:
        version 1.0.0

      • calculateGiniIndex

        public static java.lang.Double calculateGiniIndex(java.util.List<Entry> entryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> aEntryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> cEntryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> gEntryList,
                                                  java.util.List<Entry> tEntryList)
        This function is used to calculate Gini index information gain value from a parent data entry set and four subset of data entry
        Parameters:
        entryList - parent data entry list
        aEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base A
        cEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base C
        gEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base G
        tEntryList - subset of data entry list based on Nitrogen base T
        Returns:
        calculated Gini index value
        Since:
        version 1.0.0

      • calculateInformationGain

        public static java.lang.Double calculateInformationGain(java.util.List<Entry> entryList,
                                                        java.util.List<Entry> aEntryList,
                                                        java.util.List<Entry> cEntryList,
                                                        java.util.List<Entry> gEntryList,
                                                        java.util.List<Entry> tEntryList)
        The method calculateInformationGain calculates information gain for a parent DNA sequence to four subsets of DNA sequences divided based in different nitrogen bases
        Parameters:
        entryList - set of DNA sequences for parent node in the decision tree
        aEntryList - set of DNA sequences with nitrogen base A in a given position
        cEntryList - set of DNA sequences with nitrogen base C in a given position
        gEntryList - set of DNA sequences with nitrogen base G in a given position
        tEntryList - set of DNA sequences with nitrogen base T in a given position
        Returns:
        information gain based on the DNA sequences
        Since:
        version 1.0.0
